function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Data analysis on compliance measures","Impact":"Misinterpretation of compliance factors","Mitigation":"Thorough review of regression models and results","Technologies":"Statistical software for regression analysis","People":"Research team, statisticians","Owner":"Research team"},{"Description":"Use of control variables","Impact":"Confounding effects on compliance measures","Mitigation":"Careful selection of control variables based on theoretical framework","Technologies":"Statistical software for controlling variables","People":"Research team, statisticians","Owner":"Research team"},{"Description":"Use of stepwise regressions","Impact":"Potential bias in model selection","Mitigation":"Consider alternative model selection methods","Technologies":"Statistical software for model selection","People":"Research team, statisticians","Owner":"Research team"}]}
